quote: I do a personal video and I text it to them... and then I say, happy anniversary, you bought the house.
why_clipworthy: Shows a unique, personal touch in client communication that can inspire other agents.
suggested_hook: Want to stand out with your client follow-ups? Here's a unique strategy that works wonders.

quote: Honing in on your value proposition and really fine tuning it... is so much better.
why_clipworthy: Encourages agents to focus on their unique value to clients.
suggested_hook: Struggling to differentiate yourself as a REALTOR? Here's the mindset shift you need.
